Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Donald R. Linde to apply for retroactive membership in the New York state and local employees' retirement system
Summary: Authorizes Donald R. Linde to apply for retroactive membership in the New York state and local employees' retirement system.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive tier IV membership in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Donald R. Linde
